modName: TESVSnip Skyrim Edition With Translator Helper
summary: TESVSnip Skyrim Edition With Translator Helper
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=red]NOTE: Using TESVSnip might cause unexpected issues with your mod, and might break it. For more information about the issues of TESVSnip, read [url=http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/topic/1799-skyrim-handling-compressed-records-do-not-use-tesvsnip]this thread[/url].[/color][/size]

[color=#FF8080][u][b]TESVSnip Skyrim Edition v4.2.4458.50 With Translator Helper 1.50WIP[/b][/u]
[/color]


[color=red]
Hi,

I had a big personal problem. I should resume development this weekend.

Best regards
[/color]


[color=orange][u][b]TABLE OF CONTENTS[/b][/u][/color]

* Credit
* Version history
* Information
* How TH retrieve strings
* Installation
* Extract Skyrim strings files
* Build the dictionnary
* Begin new translation
* Translator Helper - The screen
* Write translation
* Manage project
* Update mod from esp already translated
* Update mod with new version
* Edit long text
* ToolTip
* Web Translation with Google
* CRTL+C / CTRL+V
* Compress mod when saving
* Message and Debug

[color=limegreen][b][u]CREDIT[/u][/b] [/color]

[i][b][color=yellow]Please endorse it to thank them for their great work.[/color][/b][/i]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5064]tesvsnip v 4.2 by figment[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11405]tesvsnip_utf-8 by leihao figment[/url]

[color=limegreen][b][u]FUTUR PLAN[/u][/b] [/color]
- Localized TH
- Localized TESvSnip
- Import mod with external file strings

[color=limegreen][b][u]VERSION HISTORY[/u][/b] [/color]

[u][b]v1.50WIP[/b][/u] - [color=red][u][b]Next Release - Work in progress[/b][/u][/color]
- Analyze Skyrim.esm for improved records filtering / dictionnary build

[u][b]v1.42[/b][/u]
- Improved records filtering-If string is empty, checkbox is unchecked.
- Implemented users request

[u][b]v1.41[/b][/u]
- Fix: Don't revert filter.
- Improved records filtering
- Add chapter - How to compress mod for reduce size when saving

[u][b]v1.40r1[/b][/u]
Thank's to Scharesoft
- Fix: CTRL A/C/V in all forms
- Fix: Now, when you close a project, All lists are emptied
- Modification: When you write strings in mod, if text box 'New Text' in translation zone is empty, string isn't wrinting in plugin.
Thank's to Zottel83
- Restore filter. Reduce the number of rows displayed when entering text in the filter area.

[u][b]v1.31r1[/b][/u]
- Fix code language in Web Translation with Google.

[u][b]v1.30r1[/b][/u]
- Fix bug in <Update Translation/New Text strings from an external '.esp.' file.> menu
- Added Web Translation with Google. See chapter.

[b]v1.20r2[/b]
- Fix GUI bugs
- Added a chapter: CRTL+C / CTRL+V

[u][b]v1.20r1[/b][/u] - [color=yellow][u][b]Very important :[/b] Rebuild dictionnary (approximately 10 mn)[/u][/color]
Thank's to: Scharesoft, PlanB29, Zottel83
- Requires .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 instead .NET Framework 4.0
- Improved reading of records
- Improved identification of strings
- Bugs fixed in dictionary generation
- Added a chapter on used method for retrieve string. Read it.
- A project is opened more quickly.
- Improved GUI (see chapter <Translator Helper - The screen>, subchapter <SCREEN 8 and 9>)
- Implementation sorting on columns (see chapter <Translator Helper - The screen>, subchapter <SCREEN 10>)

[u][b]v1.11r1[/b][/u] - [color=yellow][u][b]Very important :[/b] Rebuild dictionnary[/u][/color]
- Improved rading of records
- ImprovedUI (see chapter <Translator Helper - The screen>, subchapter <SCREEN 5,6 and 7>)
- Bugs fix
- Add fix of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11405]tesvsnip_utf-8 by Leihao [/url]
- Add 'Export to CSV'
- Before writing the strings in the mod see <Translator Helper - The screen>, subchapter <SCREEN 4> and read the point number 2

[u][b]v1.10r2[/b][/u]
- Fix Twice menu display. Thank's Scharesoft.

[u][[b]v1.10r1[/b][/u] - [color=yellow][u][b]Very important :[/b] Rebuild dictionnary[/u][/color]
* Change log:
- Big thank's at Leihao for utf-8 version
- Add fix of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11405]tesvsnip_utf-8 by Leihao [/url]
- Add japenese support (UTF-8) of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11405]Leihao [/url]
- Version of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11405]leihao[/url] better parse BTW/WRLD/DIAL/INFO records[/td]
- Open project also open mod if file exist
- Improve deletion of a project
- Improve the cleaning of a project
- Improve dictionnary generation
- Refactoring display code
- Improve reading of records
- Improve identification of records
- Best visual identification of differences between strings
- Reorganize records in tabs
- Reorganize source code
- Add japanese support
- Add multi-choice string possibility
- Add possibility write/not write string in mod
- Bugs fix

[u][b]v1.04[/b][/u]
- Fix bugs

[u][b]v1.03[/b][/u]
- Fix bugs - Add editor for long text (see chapter Edit long text) - Adding translated text in lists - Add tooltip (see chapter Tooltip)

[u][b]v1.02[/b][/u]
- Saves the source and target languages selection

[u][b]v1.01[/b][/u]
- Add search in dictionnary

[u][b]v1.00[/b][/u]
- Initiale release


[color=limegreen][b][u]INFORMATION[/u][/b] [/color]

This tool is based on [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5064]TesVSnip v4.2 by figment.[/url].
The source code of TesVSnip v4.2 is kept at 99.9% to facilitate updates.
The TesVSnip is released in GPl license also i publish my source code soon.

I already translated and updated this mod with my tools.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4984]Weapons and Armor fixes - French by SmaugNogardeht[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9923]Complete Crafting Overhaul - French by SmaugNogardeht[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11350]Smithing Perks Overhaul - French by SmaugNogardeht[/url]

Only tested with english to french.

I will complete the documentation later.

Tank's for your comment.

[color=limegreen][b][u]HOW TH RETRIEVE STRINGS[/u][/b] [/color]

For the moment, TH don't handle mod with external strings (file in .STRINGS, .DLSTRINGS and .ILSTRINGS).

Also to choose translation, TH search by the type of record (ex: FULL) and the type of string (.STRINGS, .DLSTRINGS or .ILSTRINGS).
For record type like FULL, no problem. The string type is always Strings.
But, for sample, the record type ALFD is associated with the 3 types of strings.
In the first time i analyzed it and for ALFD i found :

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_029.png[/img]

Also when TH search translation it will take in priority ILStrings because there's the largest number of occurrence.

[u]Translation problem ?[/u]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_030.png[/img]
[b]1[/b] - No matches found
[b]2[/b] - A forgetting of Bethesda !!

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_034.png[/img]
Becareful. Sample
[b]1[/b] - Original strings is NORD, Translation findind is DRAUGR !!!!
[b]2[/b] - Get FormID
[b]3[/b] - CTRL+F. In search box write FormID, in combobox select FormID. Find.
[b]4[/b] - Double click
[b]5[/b] - View record in record list
[b]6[/b] - Select subrecord. Here is Setting value. For this mod, author has replacing DRAUGR setting with NORD. Also replace DRAUGR with NORD in translation box. Author perhaps correct bug ?
[b]7[/b] - If you want, you can uncheck for disable the translation writing.

[color=limegreen][b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b] [/color]

Requires .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 installed.
Only decompress archive.

[color=limegreen][b][u]EXTRACT SKYRIM STRINGS FILES[/u][/b] [/color]

For translation you must have in your [i]'..\Data\Strings'[/i] directory the source language files and the target language files.

Sample: If the mod is in english an you want translate it in french. You must have the files below:

* Skyrim_English.STRINGS / Skyrim_English.DLSTRINGS / Skyrim_English.ILSTRINGS
* Skyrim_French.STRINGS / Skyrim_French.DLSTRINGS / Skyrim_French.ILSTRINGS

and files below optional

* Update_English.STRINGS / Update_English.DLSTRINGS / Update_English.ILSTRINGS
* Update_French.STRINGS / Update_French.DLSTRINGS / Update_French.ILSTRINGS

For your translation in British English, you can use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5351]English Strings for Skyrim by Seraphiel[/url].

[u][b]How extract files ?[/b][/u]

* Download [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1395]BSA Browser by Fawzib Rojas[/url]
Decompress and run it.
Clicked the menu below
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_003.png[/img]

* Browse and open '[i]Skyrim - Interface.bsa[/i]'
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_004.png[/img]

* Click on PATH column for sort by path.

* Select all path with strings
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_005.png[/img]

* Extract strings files in your [i]'..\Data\Strings'[/i] directory
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_006.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]BUILD THE DICTIONARY[/u][/b] [/color]

Choose dictionnary language
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_000.png[/img]

and click on
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_007.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]BEGIN NEW TRANSLATION[/u][/b] [/color]

Open plugin
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_009.png[/img]

The mod is analyzed and translated using the previously generated dictionary.

[color=limegreen][b][u]TRANSLATOR HELPER - THE SCREEN[/u][/b] [/color]

[b][u]SCREEN 1[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_021.png[/img]
[b]1[/b] - Project name
[b]2[/b] - Author of mod
[b]3[/b] - You if you want
[b]4[/b] - Source language
[b]5[/b] - Target language
[b]6[/b] - Mod information

[b][u]SCREEN 2[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_022.png[/img]
[b]1[/b] - With right click you can filter or sorter
[b]2[/b] - Tab Header: String are organized by type (based on my statistic of skyrim.esm because one record type can be a string or dlstring).
[b]3[/b] - Search text box. Below sample result for orcish.
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_023.png[/img]

[b][u]SCREEN 3[/u][/b]

Mouse on over line display string.
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_024.png[/img]

[b][u]SCREEN 4[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_025.png[/img]
[b]1[/b] - Translated text. Double click on it open speecial windows for long text
[b]2[/b] - If not checking, string is not writing in mod. Why ? Because, i view in mod that record are used for parameter but record is identified like string id. This record should not be updated. But i can identified it. Also you can unchecked this record to prevent the update.
[b]3[/b] - Old text after update
[b]4[/b] - All possible string translation. I suggest the best translation, but in some cases there are several possibilities because some records are entries in the Strings, DLStrings and/or ILStrings and i can determine the good strings.

[b][u]SCREEN 5[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_026.png[/img]

[b][u]SCREEN 6[/u][/b]

Text is strikeout after update if record has been deleted of mod.

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_027.png[/img]

[b][u]SCREEN 7[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_028.png[/img]

[b]1[/b] - Source text:
* S=String of mod is different from String Skyrim
* M=String of mod is different from Old String of mod

[b]2[/b] - Target text.
* S=String of mod is different from String Skyrim
* M=String of mod is different from Old String of mod

[b][u]SCREEN 8[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_031.png[/img]

[b]1[/b] - Choose a type of string for search
[b]2[/b] - Text to find
[b]3[/b] - Matching text is display in yellow
[b]4[/b] - Double click on column (source or target) replace text project.

[b][u]SCREEN 9[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_032.png[/img]

[b]1[/b] - Double click on column (source or target) replace text in new text box.

[b][u]SCREEN 10[/u][/b]

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_033.png[/img]

Can sort ascendent and descendent. Use click on column for change order. Don't use sub-menu.

[color=limegreen][b][u]WRITE TRANSLATION[/u][/b] [/color]

Select this menu. Check that the mod is loaded and selected.
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_012.png[/img]

When writing is complete, you can save it.
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_013.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]MANAGE PROJECT[/u][/b] [/color]

You can open,save,close and delete your project.

You can translate the mod on several days. Only open project file.

You need to open the ESP file only to update it or writing translation inside.

[color=limegreen][b][u]UPDATE MOD FROM ESP ALREADY TRANSLATED[/u][/b] [/color]

With this option, you can import in project the target strings since a file already translated. The strings must be embedded in the mod.

In this process, the mod objects are analyzed and if the same item exists in the project then the target text is replaced.

Select this menu and the after mod.
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_015.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]UPDATE MOD WITH NEW VERSION[/u][/b] [/color]

2 choices.

Choice 1:
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_016.png[/img]

Choice 2:
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_017.png[/img]

In the both cases answer questions of dialog box.

In this process, the mod items are analyzed and if the same item exists in the project then the strings are compared. If the strings are diffenrets the source text is copy in old source textbox and after replaced.

If is a new item, the string is copied in source textbox and the translation is is looked up in the dictionary.

In the both cases, the status is updated:
- if equal then you can see this suymbol '='
- if new then you can see this suymbol 'New'
- if updated then you can see this suymbol 'Upd'

[color=limegreen][b][u]EDIT LONG TEXT[/u][/b] [/color]

See below
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_018.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]TOOLTIP[/u][/b] [/color]

See below
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_020.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]CRTL+C / CTRL+V[/u][/b] [/color]

See below
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_035.png[/img]

Check <Use Windows Clipboard>

[color=limegreen][b][u]WEB TRANSLATION WITH GOOGLE[/u][/b] [/color]

Translate text or selected text.
The first translation is slow due to time for connection.

See below
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_036.png[/img]


[color=limegreen][b][u]COMPRESS MOD WHEN SAVING[/u][/b] [/color]

Activate this options for compress the mod when saving.

[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_037.png[/img]

[color=limegreen][b][u]MESSAGE AND DEBUG[/u][/b] [/color]

Some messages and errors are display here.
[img]http://piblf.perso.sfr.fr/skyrim/tesvsnip_th_019.png[/img]
author: SmaugNogardeht
